PathOfBuilding.Notes:
body - 6L hexblast hat - 5L doom curse vixen - 3 curses + discipline boots - 4L wither totem, + 2 wand - 3L flame dash, arcane surge + 1 shield - 3L shield charge, fortify, faster attacks
culling? blind? stone golem taunt? es on block?
focus : shock & crit is lucky
